channel.title: Currant|Nye County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Currant|Nye County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Tonopah and Bishop (California). This is the first appearance of Bishop as a control city on US-6 westbound.

item.title: US-6 West at NV-379 North
item.description: US-6 West at NV-379 North in Currant.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching NV-379
item.description: US-6 West approaching NV-379 north to Duckwater. Continue west on US-6 for Tonopah.
